Club Membership

The 9-hole “Fashion” course at the Fashion Golf & Country Club features 3,164 yards of golf from the longest tees for a par of 36.

We actively encourage new members to the Club

Contact us if you have any questions.

To arrange to play the course and/or further information about our membership fees please telephone the Secretary on 985.783.6486 or email info@fashiongolfcourse.com.

If you’re new to the area or even new to the golf, there is no finer or more welcoming club in which to learn, practice or play. If you’re a serious golfer, we offer you all the challenges, competition and camaraderie you could ever need. These are good times to be at Fashion Golf & Country Club – join us today.

Weather Report

Be sure to check the weather before you head out for a round of golf. We will try our best to keep you updated on any closings that’s caused by server weather.
